zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[短期震荡调整，需关注关键支撑位]
zh.content:
当前比特币/美元的价格为90815.29，24小时内小幅下跌0.11%。从价格走势来看，BTC/USD在91080的高点与90815.29的低点之间震荡整理，显示出短期内市场情绪相对谨慎。整体趋势尚未明确，需要进一步观察市场动向。

在技术指标方面，RSI尚未提供数据，但MACD显示出-409.51的负值，表明空头力量仍在主导市场。SMA(20)为91267.33，当前价格低于此水平，进一步确认了短期内的看跌信号。这些技术指标共同暗示，市场可能面临一定的调整压力。

支撑位方面，90815.29附近是当前的关键支撑位，一旦跌破可能会引发更多的抛售压力，进一步测试下方支撑区间。如果价格能够重新突破91080，可能会恢复短期的上涨趋势，挑战91267.33的阻力位。

交易建议上，建议投资者保持观望，待市场趋势明确后再做决策。如果价格跌破90815.29支撑位，可以考虑小幅做空，若突破91080，则可考虑逢低买入。风险管理至关重要，务必设置止损以降低潜在损失。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Bitcoin against the US Dollar (BTC/USD) is 90,815.29, reflecting a slight decline of 0.11% over the last 24 hours. This modest movement suggests a period of consolidation following recent volatility. The price has tested a resistance level at 91,080, which, if broken, could lead to a bullish sentiment. Conversely, a sustained move below the current level may indicate a bearish outlook, necessitating cautious trading strategies.

With the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) positioned at 91,267.33, the market is currently trading below this significant trend line, presenting a bearish signal. Traders should monitor this SMA closely, as a failure to reclaim this level could signify further downward pressure. The MACD reading of -409.51 suggests that selling momentum is currently dominating, and without a positive divergence, the outlook remains cautious.

In terms of support levels, the immediate support appears to be around the current price of 90,815.29. A breakdown below this level could lead to a test of lower support at approximately 90,000, which could act as a psychological barrier for traders. On the flip side, if Bitcoin can regain the 91,080 resistance, it may trigger renewed buying interest, potentially leading to a retest of the SMA and further upward movement.

Given the current market conditions, traders might consider a wait-and-see approach. A confirmation of a breakout above 91,080 could present a buying opportunity, while a drop below 90,815.29 would warrant a reassessment of long positions. Implementing stop-loss orders near these critical levels can help manage risk effectively, ensuring prudent trading amidst the prevailing uncertainty.
